options.name: None/Light Cloth
options.description: No mask, possibly eating or drinking. Cloth mask, thin or loose (bandana, buff; or: loose fit, falls down)

options.name: Thick Cloth
options.description: Multi-layer cloth mask with tight, secure fit

options.name: Surgical Mask/Cloth Mask with Filter
options.description: Loose-fitting disposable blue (or green) surgical mask

options.name: N95. KN85, FFP2
options.description: It fits, but you are NOT sure if it is sealed

options.name: N95 Sealed
options.description: Air-tight seal. No valve, no earloops, no beard

options.name: 1 metre
options.description: Normal socialising without any distancing measures in place

options.name: 2 metres
options.description: Individuals and groups can maintain min 2m distance

options.name: More than 3 metres
options.description: Individuals and groups can maintain min 3m distance
